Continuing to the surface defects that are collected in our country, these are assessed by means of visual payment condition evaluation according to the modified Swiss Index methodology.
Each year, half of Slovenian main and regional roads network is assessed with results for each 50 meters of payment.
And on motorways the whole network is assessed every second year.
Visual payment condition evaluation includes the following surface defects cracking, reveling port course, and patching.
For each type of distress, the payment condition is assessed with the severity of the distress in the affected area.
Each surface defect is weighted according to Sean weights.
The MSI is the weighted sum of the products of values 01, two or three.
For the severity of distress and for the affected area, for every 50 meters length with section according to the shown equation.

Average annual daily traffic.

These two columns are saying that only 15% of motorways are in a poor or very poor condition, while 50 or more of the state roads are in poor condition.

Asities measure turning on Slovenians main and original Rd networks and the flexor is measured with a FWD at the network level.
Every measurement is performed.
One measurement per 200 meters.
And each year 1/4 of the national network is measured.
The condition of payment structure is expressed by means of residual payment life.
Again.
An impression of the result that we got and it is most probably that mainly because of the very low traffic loadings.
Want national votes?
Which is shown in the figure.
The results are surprisingly good, as you can see in the right part of the chart.
More than 80% of the national roads are considered as we're in a very good condition.

Last part of my presentation is dedicated to so-called problem or slippery payments internals, which occurred about two years ago in our country and makes a lot of discussions with Tim politicians and within the experts of the road infrastructure.
And that's why we thought that this should be a problem expressed to yourself, and maybe awesome.
Automatic for some discussions.
It has been found that significantly larger number of accidents due to slips in tunnels, especially those with the cargo vehicles, have happened in tunnels.

With the ordinary monitoring of skeet resistance, we found that allows very low skit resistance and texture depth has been found in this payment and just to get you an impression that it is suspected that design spitting tunnels is 100 kilometers.
A prompt action action was needed to reestablish normal and safe driving condition.
In these structures, a technical group was established with the task of finding the best solution to the problem.
Including the need for additional and more detailed measurements of the characteristics of payment services internal.
The technical group realized in the results of Scooters, Instant Measurement experience obtained when performing the try.
Retexturing of concrete payments by means of different types of technologies.
Experience from Thomas Tunnel Salmon concrete payment countries was looked after.
It is to mention that one of the important elements that we found during the during making the analyzes is the traffic situation.
Because we found in the results of analyzes indicated an annual traffic loading growth rate of 16.2 percentage, which has been determined within the period of 2000, two 2006.
This is an influence of joining Slovenia to European Union.
And because of this element, the expected life of 20 years was actually rich after just three years.
In one week year we had tested several surface treatments.

Short blasting water blasting Bush hammering rough diamond grinding and fine diamond grinding and at the end we have decided to use the last one fine diamond grinding to improve the situation of the payments in the tunnels.
Here you can see the outcome of this improvement Sam.
I think that.
Now we are able to do from the very beginning.
Where we start constructing our roads, this is the.

New surface concrete after diamond grinding just to get you an impression about the cement concrete mix that has been used in this payment is that aggregate between 4 and 8 millimeters was silicate, while the two to four millimeter aggregate was carbonate.
This was according to the technical specification that has been used a few years ago during this this.
Two year.
We have improved our technical specification and one of the decision in this improvement is that we have decided now to use 100% of aggregate into quality of silicate.
Until we decide that we can also change the technology.
A special topic that is being discussed within the technical Group was dedicated to the.
Narrow section of the payment with a width of between 25 to 35 centimeters, which was left untreated along the line separating the inside Lane from the overtaking Lane.
So you can see on the left and on the right part the treated surface and in the middle this narrow Lane and just to get you an impression at the very right.
This is next picture where in this Lane we're putting the road marking.
This is not a finished story.
We have treated and improve the situation of the script.
Resistance on this surface is, but we are continuing with the monitoring with the periodical monitoring of the Skitters instance and texture measurements.
To verify the durability of the works carried out.
And wander the.

Elements that we found within the working group is that it is to improve also the maintenance and cleaning of the retexture payment and to use more powerful clinical equipment which would make it possible to clean the payment services at higher pressure.
This is the work that we expect that will be done in the next three to five years, and we expect it.
Durability of this improved services will last for at least four five years.
So this is the end of my presentation.
If there will be any question I'm willing to answer them or my colleagues will answer to them.
Thank you very much.
